"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5514d93b63687255e6af0400#post_5514d93b63687255e6af0400
Undertones is one thing. That gives the cute stuff a nice little bite to it, a bit of hook that draws the imagination further into events and makes things seem just that little bit more real.

A black hedgehog with a gun and a dark, tortured past on the other hand is just awfulness personified.
